${modID}:PowerID.NAME: Ultimate Power
DESCRIPTIONS: You are Very Cool and Strong.

${modID}:RondelmancyPower.NAME: Rondelmancy
DESCRIPTIONS: When you gain #yShivs, gain #b%d more #yShiv%s. If your hand is full, play them instead.

${modID}:UpdateJammerPower.NAME: Update Jammer
DESCRIPTIONS: Orbs continue their passive effects after being #yEvoked.
I can't jam this!

${modID}:OrbShockPower.NAME: Jammed Lightning
DESCRIPTIONS: Activate #b%d passive #yLightning%s at the end of your turn.

${modID}:OrbFrostPower.NAME: Jammed Frost
DESCRIPTIONS: Activate #b%d passive #yFrost%s at the end of your turn.

${modID}:OrbDarkPower.NAME: Jammed Darkness
DESCRIPTIONS: Activate #b%d passive #yDark%s at the end of your turn.

${modID}:OrbPlasmaPower.NAME: Jammed Plasma
DESCRIPTIONS: Activate #b%d passive #yPlasma%s at the start of your turn.

${modID}:OrbStarlightPower.NAME: Jammed Starlight
DESCRIPTIONS: Activate #b%d passive #yStarlight%s at the start of your turn.

${modID}:CruelSunPower.NAME: Cruel Sun
DESCRIPTIONS: You cannot exit #yWrath.

${modID}:DoubleAttacksPower.NAME: Double Attacks
DESCRIPTIONS: All your #yAttacks are played twice for the next #b%d turn%s.

${modID}:FracturePower.NAME: Fracture
DESCRIPTIONS: Receive #b%d additional damage from #yAttacks. Reduce #yFracture by #b1 each turn.

${modID}:LoseFocusPower.NAME: Focus Down
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, lose #b%d #yFocus.

${modID}:HyperPropellantPower.NAME: No Channeling
DESCRIPTIONS: Cannot #yChannel Orbs for #b%d turn%s.

${modID}:MordhauPower.NAME: Mordhau
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yAttacks apply #yFracture for the next #b%d turn%s.

${modID}:PublicVoidPower.NAME: Public Void
DESCRIPTIONS: Cost 0 cards trigger the passive ability of all #yDark Orbs #b%d time%s.

${modID}:BatteringRamPower.NAME: Battering
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal #b%d damage to enemies when you attack them.

${modID}:StargazerPower.NAME: Stargazer
DESCRIPTIONS: Channel #b%d #yStarlight%s at the end of your turn.

${modID}:AcrimonyPower.NAME: Acrimony
DESCRIPTIONS: Receive #b5% additional damage for every card in your hand. Reduce #yAcrimony by #b1 each turn.

${modID}:CausticsPower.NAME: Caustics
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yShivs apply #b1 #yAcrimony for the next #b%d turn%s.

${modID}:SadomasochismPower.NAME: Sadomasochism
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw #b%d card%s whenever you apply #yPoison.

${modID}:TachycardiaPower.NAME: Tachycardia
DESCRIPTIONS: Apply #b%d #yAcrimony to enemies whenever you discard. At the end of your turns, enemies gain #yPoison equal to their #yAcrimony.

${modID}:AmbientDeathPower.NAME: Ambient Death
DESCRIPTIONS: Playing #ySkills applies #b%d #yPoison to all enemies.

${modID}:FoolhardyPower.NAME: Foolhardy
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b10 #yBlock gained, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by #b%d.

${modID}:ReturnHPPower.NAME: Return HP
DESCRIPTIONS: When attacked, you heal #b%d HP.

${modID}:BurningMontantePower.NAME: Burning Montante
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yAttacks that cost 2 or more cost 1 more, and are played #b%d additional time%s.
